name: SELF APART
description:
REASSEMBLE YOURSELF!

Oh no! Something terrible happened to Mr. Limbs the Frankenjoined monster! Help him find his body parts and put them back together! Maybe start with something small... AND END WITH THE MOST IMPORTANT PART! YOUR OWN HEAD!

CONTROLS

Look and Click to control a body part.

WASD - Move

E - Attach to body part

EL STUDIOS ARE

Enrique "Nebuchaddy" Lopez - Lead Design / Programming

Annemarie "Wyvarie" Daniel - Character Design / Animation

Julija "Jul" Fivčuková - 3D Art

Siddhant "cdsid10" Rathor - UI Design / Additional Programming

Kilian Liccia - Sound Design / Music
